column1: Larnach was one of the woodmen who dwelt in the Forest of Brethil
column2: south of the River Teiglin. These people were harried by the Gaurwaith outlaws from Doriaths western borders
column3: and in a raid by these outlaws
column4: Larnachs daughter was rescued by Túrin

column2: Beleg later came upon the fenced homestead that was Larnachs home
